Class MainAppointmentsController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainAppointmentsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainAppointmentsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class. Controls the main appointment screen.

    • buttonToUpdateHandler

      public void buttonToUpdateHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method handles the update appointment button. First checks if an appointment is selected. If not, it alerts as such.
      Parameters:
      event - When actioned it loads the add appointment fxml file with the pretense of updating a current customer.

    • monthSorter

      public void monthSorter(javafx.collections.ObservableList appointmentsOL) throws SQLException
      This method creates an observable list with appointments for this month.
      Parameters:
      appointmentsOL - The observable list with all appointments.

      The lambda expression on line 330 filters the appointments observable list. The filter selects all appointments in the current calendar month. It is justified because the code is more efficient, and therefore the program is more efficient.

      Throws:
      SQLException

    • weekSorter

      public void weekSorter(javafx.collections.ObservableList appointmentsOL)
      This method creates an observablelist with appointments for this week.
      Parameters:
      appointmentsOL - The observable list with all appointments.

      The lambda expression on line 349 filters the appointments observable list. The filter selects all appointments in a rolling week starting the day before the current day. It is justified because the code is more efficient, and therefore the program is more efficient.
